ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Int items.
ygData.msgSnippet: Do it like a new zone... CON EVERYTHING. There are guards nearby the fella that you have to turn stuff into though. The guards may wonder far enough way to do
ygData.messageBody:
Do it like a new zone... CON EVERYTHING. There are guards nearby the fella
that you have to turn stuff into though. The guards may wonder far enough
way to do the trade, but not sure.

As a side note... because I killed so many treants I think it's funny that I
can't even walk around in my home city without getting attacked. Everytime I
come home I have to kill that Lydia person that does the mail quest, or she
will chase me all over ak'anon. I usually kill her at the zone line though
as a warning to all that enter the city. MUWHAHAHA

Manbik Prodo'Lues
The Flying Gnome Lich on Tunare

-----Original Message-----
From: Grooms, Anthony [mailto:anthony.grooms@...]
Sent: Friday, April 07, 2000 10:49 AM
To: 'EQ_Necromancer@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Int items.


What if you are a Gnome necro that has killed Lady Shae in Freeport a couple
of times? She scowled at me from the first time I saw her. Killing her
lowers FelGuard faction. Can you still do the quest?

-----Original Message-----
From: Jenkins, Jason [mailto:jason@...]
Sent: 04/07/2000 12:12 PM
To: 'EQ_Necromancer@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Int items.


I agree with most, but John never mentioned what race he was. If your a
Gnome or Erudite necro... DO THE MYSTIC CLOAK QUEST!!! It's a much better
item than the Molten cloak, Mystic Cloak stats are AC8 INT+5 SVMagic+5. Dark
Elves will have a very hard time doing the quest because of factions.

<Snip>

Manbik Prodo'Lues
The Flying Gnome Lich on Tunare
